translated: The father and mother, or the wheel,🔽should be placed in the skull cup above.🔽The wise one should bind it with human sinew🔽or a thread made from the hair of the dead.

original: mi rgyus dag gis mkhas pas bsdam/_/mi'i rgyus pas gzungs thag bya/_/gtsho
analyzed: mi rgyus dag gis mkhas pas bsdam/_/mi'i rgyus pas gzungs thag bya/_/gtsho
translated: The dhāraṇī cord should be made from human sinew.🔽Having bound it with the dhāraṇī,

original: dang gzungs kyi bzung byas nas/_/man+dal steng bzhag bzlas pa bya/_/'khor
analyzed: dang gzungs kyi bzung byas nas/_/man+dal steng bzhag bzlas pa bya/_/'khor
translated: place it on the maṇḍala and recite.🔽The recitation of the mantra above and below the wheel

original: lo steng 'og sngags bzla ba/_/gtsho dang gzungs kyi 'bum phrag bzlas/_/de
analyzed: lo steng 'og sngags bzla ba/_/gtsho dang gzungs kyi 'bum phrag bzlas/_/de
translated: should be recited one hundred thousand times with the dhāraṇī.🔽Then, when the recitation is complete,

original: nas bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang /_/dur khrod dam ni lha khang ngam/_/lha klu drag
analyzed: nas bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang /_/dur khrod dam ni lha khang ngam/_/lha klu drag
translated: in a charnel ground, a temple, or a place of the powerful gods and nāgas,

original: po'i gnas su mnan/_/lha la sogs pa shi bar bstan/_/de'i bsgrub pa'i🔽gnas rnams kyang /_/dben pa'i phyogs su byas nas ni/_/bla ma pha ma mchod
analyzed: po'i gnas su mnan/_/lha la sogs pa shi bar bstan/_/de'i bsgrub pa'i gnas rnams kyang /_/dben pa'i phyogs su byas nas ni/_/bla ma pha ma mchod
translated: and it is taught that they will die.🔽And also the places of practice🔽should be made in isolated places,🔽and the enemies who harm

original: pa'i gnas/_/de la gnod pa'i dgra bo rnams/_/gang byung yang ni bsgral bar
analyzed: pa'i gnas/_/de la gnod pa'i dgra bo rnams/_/gang byung yang ni bsgral bar
translated: those places of worship of the guru, father and mother,🔽whatever they are, should be liberated.🔽If they are not liberated at that time,

original: bya/_/de tshhe bsgral bar ma byas na/_/rang nyid 'chi bar bstan pa yin/_/
analyzed: bya/_/de tshhe bsgral bar ma byas na/_/rang nyid 'chi bar bstan pa yin/_/
translated: it is taught that you yourself will die.🔽Do not teach this secret to others.

original: gsang bya gzhan la bstan mi bya/_/las kyi gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po'i bsgrub
analyzed: gsang bya gzhan la bstan mi bya/_/las kyi gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po'i bsgrub
translated: The sādhana of Karma Yama Dharmarāja,

original: thabs/_/slob dpon la li ta badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: thabs/_/slob dpon la li ta badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
translated: composed by Ācārya Lalitavajra, is complete.

original: bal po thugs rje chen po dang /_bod kyi ban de ra lotsh+tshha ba rdo rje grags🔽kyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
analyzed: bal po thugs rje chen po dang /_bod kyi ban de ra lotsh+tshha ba rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
translated: Translated by the Nepalese Mahākaruṇika and the Tibetan Bhandhe Ralotshāwa Dorjé Drak.

original: las kyi gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po'i bsgrub thabs bzhugs
analyzed: las kyi gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po'i bsgrub thabs bzhugs
translated: The sādhana of Karma Yama Dharmarāja is present.
